description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Invincible Tiger: The Legend of Han Tao is here and it's packed with nonstop kung fu action! Prepare yourself for the first Digital 3D title on Xbox LIVE Arcade that offers a more immersive experience than ever before! Use all of your best combos and lightning fast dodge techniques to destroy your opponents and protect the Star of Destiny.Travel to a variety of beautiful locations while rocking out to the funky 70’s soundtrack. Play cooperatively with a friend at home or online and teach your foes the true meaning of pain. Feel closer to the action than ever before as the 3D features thrust the action right into your living room. Kung fu action, beautiful environments, awesome music, cooperative play and 3D all in one download! Buy it now! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) The Evil Overlord must be stopped! Perform devastating combos, swift dodge maneuvers and punishing finishing moves on waves of ruthless minions to protect the Star of Destiny. Enjoy a variety of modes like Endurance and Time Trial in addition to the action packed story mode! Travel to a variety of beautiful locations while rocking out to the funky 70’s soundtrack.
